rules_text:
Vigilance
When Icing Aficionado enters, tap target creature.
Decompose into Food {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Food artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
Changed name, changed art
Elemental —> Ooze
Reworked ability
